title: Bryce Canyon National Park: Sheep Creek Campsite
body: Sheep Creek Campsite       This site is shaded by Ponderosa Pines, Junipers and Gambel Oak. Sheep Creek can be heard flowing just to the south. The tops of the pink cliffs are visible above the trees. This site is 2.9 miles (4.7 km) from the Sheep Creek / Swamp Canyon parking lot and 4.8 miles (7.7 km) from the Yellow Creek Campsite. Datum WGS 84, 37 34 19.2 N, 112 11 58.3 W. Altitude 7212 feet (2198 km).  Â     Sheep Creek Campsite and stream nearby text and images courtesy of Ron Warner
